title: Language Modeling: Test Sentence Probability
body_html:
I have trained and saved an RNN model using the tutorial given here in the Tensorflow docs. I want to evaluate this model by finding log probability of each test sentence. I would really appreciate if someone can help me out with this.
Thanks!
body_text:
I have trained and saved an RNN model using the tutorial given here in the Tensorflow docs. I want to evaluate this model by finding log probability of each test sentence. I would really appreciate if someone can help me out with this.
Thanks!
body:
I have trained and saved an RNN model using the tutorial given [here in the Tensorflow docs](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/tutorials/recurrent/index.html). I want to evaluate this model by finding **log probability of each test sentence**. I would really appreciate if someone can help me out with this.
Thanks!
